PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03582018-03-26PCH,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectNational Capital Commission ** land exchange **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (NCC) to conclude a land exchange with the City of Ottawa. The City needs to acquire NCC lands located along Sussex Drive, totalling approximately 703.5 square metres in area. In exchange for this disposal to the City, the NCC will acquire approximately 1,193 square metres of City lands, also located along Sussex Drive, and a road allowance that is part of Lady Grey Drive, in Ottawa, Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
